hero.headline: KOREA 360 UAE — A New Bridge Connecting Korea and the Middle East
hero.subtext: The first and only K-Content & Product Experience Hub. Experience all of Korea — K-content, culture, tourism, fashion, food, beauty, and lifestyle — in one immersive space.

home.experienceHubDesc: Experience 15 themed zones — from K-food and K-beauty to characters, design, and tourism — designed to be scannable, immersive, and easy to navigate.

valueProp1.title: First and only K-Content & Product hub
valueProp1.description: The only experience hub of its kind in the region — K-content, culture, tourism, fashion, food, beauty, and lifestyle in one place.

valueProp2.title: 15 immersive Experience Zones
valueProp2.description: From K-POP to K-food, everything about Korea unfolds like a 360° panorama. Pick a zone and experience the uniqueness of Korean brands from all directions.

valueProp3.title: Visit us in Dubai
valueProp3.description: Dubai Festival City Mall, 1st Floor (Near North Parking) — easy to reach, easy to explore, and perfect for families and friends.

experienceAll.title: Experience all of Korea in one place
experienceAll.body1: KOREA 360 is where visitors can experience all of Korea — K-content, culture, tourism, fashion, food, beauty, and lifestyle. From K-pop to K-food, everything unfolds like a 360° panorama. Experience the uniqueness of Korean brands from all directions.
experienceAll.body2: Led by the Korea Creative Content Agency (KOCCA), the leading institution fostering the growth of the K-content industry — from broadcasting, games, animation, characters, webtoons, and music to fashion and emerging technology.

experienceZones.title: Experience Zones
experienceZones.description: 15 zones that make K-culture easy to browse — from K-POP and K-Character to K-Beauty, K-Food, K-Tourism, and more. Pick a zone and dive in.

partners.title: Partner organizations
partners.description: In collaboration with trusted organizations supporting culture, trade, tourism, design, and exports across Korea and the UAE.

kcc.title: Korean Cultural Center (KCC)
kcc.description: Promotes Korean culture and cultural exchange through various programs and events.

at.title: Korea Agro-Fisheries & Food Trade Corporation (aT)
at.description: Government agency that promotes trade, export, and marketing of Korean food and beverages.

kcii.title: Korean Cosmetic Industry Institute (KCII)
kcii.description: Research organization promoting K-Beauty by researching ingredient safety, creating a global skin data bank, and supporting exports.

kcdf.title: Korean Craft & Design Foundation (KCDF)
kcdf.description: Promotes Korean craft, design, and Hanbok globally while preserving cultural heritage and fostering regional development.

kidp.title: Korea Institute of Design Promotion (KIDP)
kidp.description: Promotes Korea's design industry and strengthens design capabilities of companies.

kita.title: Korea International Trade Association (KITA)
kita.description: Non-profit organization that supports Korea's trade and economic development, aiding domestic companies' international expansion.

kosme.title: Korea SMEs and Startups Agency (KOSME)
kosme.description: Government agency that supports the growth and development of SMEs and startups in South Korea.

kto.title: Korea Tourism Organization (KTO)
kto.description: Government agency that promotes tourism to South Korea and enhances its image as a travel destination.

kotra.title: Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency (KOTRA)
kotra.description: Government agency that supports trade and global expansion of Korean businesses.

visit.title: Visit KOREA 360 UAE
visit.description: Find us at Dubai Festival City Mall. Bring friends, take your time, and explore zone by zone.
visit.locationValue: Dubai Festival City Mall, 1st Floor (Near North Parking), Dubai, UAE
visit.asideDescription: Start with the zones you're most curious about, then loop back for favorites — the layout is designed for easy navigation and repeat discovery.
visit.mapCaption: KOREA 360 Explore Map — find your way through the zones

home.mapAlt: KOREA 360 Explore Map — floor plan showing 18 Experience Zones at Dubai Festival City Mall

footer.tagline: Official marketing & cultural experience website for KOREA 360 UAE at Dubai Festival City Mall.

index.title: Experience Zones
index.description: Browse 15 categories and explore each zone's details.

detail.exploreZoneDesc: Discover curated highlights, a quick gallery, and what to look for when you visit.

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.description: A quick set of cues to guide your visit — designed to be scannable and easy to navigate.

visitCta.title: Visit KOREA 360 UAE
visitCta.description: Find us at Dubai Festival City Mall — browse more zones, then plan your visit.
visitCta.asideDescription: Start with what you love, then explore nearby zones — the experience is curated for clarity, breathing room, and quick scanning.

notFound.title: Zone not found
notFound.description: The zone you're looking for doesn't exist (or the link has changed).

contents-experience.name: Contents Experience
contents-experience.subtitle: Content Experience space offers an immersive showcase of Korea's diverse creative industries. Visitors can engage with interactive content, including Noraebang (Korean style singing rooms) experiences and a variety of audiovisual screenings. This space highlights Korea's cutting-edge media trends and its influence.

highlights.title: Interactive
highlights.description: Step-In, Ulti-racer, PUBG, Nestyle and more.

content-multiplex.name: Content Multiplex
content-multiplex.subtitle: Content Multiplex is an interactive and immersive XR experience space that combines spatial sensors with integrated wall projections. Designed for all ages, this space offers a unique and engaging experience beyond passive viewing.

k-beauty.name: K-Beauty
k-beauty.subtitle: Step into the world of K-beauty, where you can experience a variety of skincare, haircare, and makeup products. Discover the innovation and quality behind Korea's beauty industry.

highlights.title: Skincare
highlights.description: Routines and products for every need.

highlights.title: Innovation
highlights.description: Why K-beauty became a global trend.

highlights.title: Try
highlights.description: Best products made with natural ingredients.

k-character.name: K-Character
k-character.subtitle: The K-Character Zone is a space dedicated to introducing Korea's 'Young Toy'. Experience a world of wonder for children, brought to life in collaboration with Korea's famous toy companies.

highlights.title: Wonder
highlights.description: A space for children and families.

k-craft-design.name: K-Craft & Design
k-craft-design.subtitle: An exhibition of Korean traditional crafts infused with modern design, highlighting exquisite artistry and craftsmanship.

highlights.title: Timeless
highlights.description: Beauty and precision of handmade works.

k-culture.name: K-Culture
k-culture.subtitle: The K-Culture is a space where visitors can experience Korea's traditional culture and history at a glance.

highlights.title: Traditional
highlights.description: Culture and history at a glance.

k-fashion.name: K-Fashion
k-fashion.subtitle: K-Fashion showcases the dynamic and evolving trends of Korean style, seamlessly blending tradition with modern innovation.

k-food.name: K-Food
k-food.subtitle: Explore a variety of nutritional supplements made from ginseng and red ginseng, and experience the taste and culture of Korea through authentic flavors.

highlights.title: Culture
highlights.description: Food as a window to Korea.

k-lifestyle.name: K-Lifestyle
k-lifestyle.subtitle: Experience a collection of lifestyle products from Korea, ranging from fashionable accessories to essential home appliances and convenience items.

k-pop.name: K-POP
k-pop.subtitle: The K-POP exhibition showcases a curated collection of albums, official merchandise, and light sticks from renowned K-POP artists.

highlights.title: Hallyu
highlights.description: A key hub of the global K-POP movement.

k-star-hall.name: K-Star Hall
k-star-hall.subtitle: K-Star Hall is a dedicated exhibition space showcasing exclusive collections from leading K-POP artists and Korean actors.

highlights.title: Hallyu
highlights.description: The global impact of Korean culture.

k-tourism.name: K-Tourism
k-tourism.subtitle: The K-Tourism is a space designed to introduce both well-known and hidden travel destinations in Korea through videos.

highlights.title: Videos
highlights.description: Diverse aspects of Korea on film.

highlights.title: Plan
highlights.description: Content to help plan your trip.

k-webtoon-vr.name: K-Webtoon & K-POP VR
k-webtoon-vr.subtitle: Easily explore top Korean webtoons from eight major studios. Experience K-POP concerts like never before through VR with Venta X and Meta Quest.

highlights.title: Webtoons
highlights.description: Top Korean webtoons from eight major studios.

highlights.title: K-POP VR
highlights.description: Virtual concerts with Venta X and Meta Quest.
Full immersion in concert and story.

main-atrium.name: Main Atrium
main-atrium.subtitle: The cultural hub of KOREA 360, hosting live performances, workshops, and immersive K-content experiences.

vivid-360.name: VIVID 360
vivid-360.subtitle: An immersive media zone offering a multi-sensory experience of K-content through vivid visuals and surround sound.

highlights.title: Pulse
highlights.description: Feel Korean culture in the room.

index.title: Events
index.description: Ongoing and upcoming events at KOREA 360 UAE. Join workshops, meet-ups, and cultural experiences.
index.noOngoing: No ongoing events at the moment. Check back soon or browse upcoming events.
index.noUpcoming: No upcoming events scheduled. Follow us for announcements.

notFound.title: Event not found
notFound.description: The event you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

k-pop-experience-feb.title: K-POP Experience Week
k-pop-experience-feb.shortDescription: Live performances, meet-and-greets, and K-POP merchandise pop-up at the Content Experience zone.
k-pop-experience-feb.description: Join us for a full week of K-POP celebrations. Enjoy live performances from emerging artists, meet-and-greet sessions, exclusive merchandise, and photo zones.

k-beauty-workshop-feb.title: K-Beauty Skincare Workshop
k-beauty-workshop-feb.shortDescription: Hands-on skincare and makeup sessions with K-beauty experts. Limited slots.
k-beauty-workshop-feb.description: Learn the famous K-beauty routine from experts. Sessions cover double cleansing, sheet masks, and trending makeup looks. All materials provided.

hanbok-experience.title: Hanbok Try-On Experience
hanbok-experience.shortDescription: Try on traditional Hanbok and take photos in our themed backdrop. Free for visitors.
hanbok-experience.description: Experience Korean traditional dress with our Hanbok try-on corner. Multiple styles for adults and children. Professional photo backdrop available.

k-food-tasting-mar.title: K-Food Tasting Festival
k-food-tasting-mar.shortDescription: Sample Korean snacks, drinks, and street food. New brands and classics.
k-food-tasting-mar.description: A curated tasting event featuring Korean snacks, beverages, and street food. Meet brands from the K-Food zone and discover new favorites.

k-character-meet-mar.title: K-Character Meet & Greet
k-character-meet-mar.shortDescription: Meet popular K-characters, take photos, and get limited merchandise.
k-character-meet-mar.description: Character appearances and photo opportunities with beloved K-characters. Limited-edition merchandise and activities for kids.

korea-tourism-fair.title: Korea Tourism & Travel Fair
korea-tourism-fair.shortDescription: Discover travel destinations, get travel tips, and win prizes from KTO.
korea-tourism-fair.description: The Korea Tourism Organization (KTO) presents a travel fair with destination booths, travel tips, cultural highlights, and giveaways.
